hero.title: Privacy Policy

intro.title: Overview
intro.headline: How we handle your data
intro.body: This privacy notice explains which data we process, for what purposes, and what rights you have.
intro.contactBody: Meri Boarding Group GmbH, Flamingoweg 70, D-70378 Stuttgart

blocks.title: Data we collect
blocks.body: Contact and inquiry data (e.g., name, email, phone), booking details, and technical usage data (e.g., IP address, browser).

blocks.title: How we use data
blocks.body: To respond to your inquiry, provide offers, manage contracts, communicate with you, and improve our services.

blocks.title: Sharing with third parties
blocks.body: We share data only with service providers needed for hosting, email, or IT operations. No sharing for advertising.

blocks.title: Retention
blocks.body: We keep data only as long as needed for the stated purpose or as required by law.

blocks.title: Cookies & analytics
blocks.body: We use functional cookies and, if applicable, analytics tools to improve the experience. See related notices for details.

blocks.title: Your rights
blocks.body: You have the right to access, rectify, delete, restrict, object to processing, and request data portability.

cta.title: Questions about privacy?
cta.body: Get in touch if you want information or wish to exercise your rights.
